overview:
As a writer Peter has the unique ability of weaving a masterful storyline straight from his heart while teaching powerful principles for successful living.

Aside from being a best selling author, motivational speaker, business coach and the CEO/Chairman of OE Design - The Web Designers, Peter also enjoys gardening and composing music while residing on the Gold Coast of Australia with his wife Shelley.

Peter is passionate about inspiring others to become all that God has created them to be. He also has the unique ability to draw the richness out of everyday experiences, in order to equip others with success strategies that can be readily applied to their lives.

With a life mission to lift people, Peter has already lifted thousands all around the globe with his insightful words and inspirational thoughts found in both his books and through his Motivational Blog that is viewed by people from over 46 nations.
